schema_name: Climbspot Directory Data Schema with Web Enrichment Prompts

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique stable identifier for the gym row.
fields.prompt: Assign a unique integer ID for this row. Output integer only. If no reliable logic applies, return 'null'.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Official public-facing name of the climbing gym.
fields.prompt: Using web search with the business name '{{name}}' and full address '{{address}}', identify the official public-facing gym name as used on signage, homepage, or Google Business Profile. Remove suffixes like LLC/Inc/PT unless part of branding. Output Title Case. If unsure, return 'null'.

fields.name: slug
fields.description: URL-safe identifier built from name and city.
fields.prompt: Using the name '{{name}}' and city from '{{address}}', generate a kebab-case slug (lowercase, hyphen-separated). Append the city if duplicates exist. Output slug only or 'null'.

fields.name: verified
fields.description: Whether the gym is verified on Google or official listings.
fields.prompt: Search Google Maps and official sources for '{{name}}' at '{{address}}' to confirm verification status. Output TRUE, FALSE, or 'null' if unclear.

fields.name: status
fields.prompt: For '{{name}}' at '{{address}}', determine operational status. Output one of: open|temporarily_closed|permanently_closed. If uncertain, return 'null'.

fields.name: full_address
fields.description: Complete formatted address as used publicly.
fields.prompt: Return the complete formatted address for '{{name}}' as shown on Google Maps or the official site in a single line. If not found, return 'null'.

fields.name: postal_code
fields.prompt: Extract the postal/ZIP code for '{{name}}' from the address. Preserve leading zeros. If missing, return 'null'.

fields.name: latitude
fields.description: Latitude of the entrance in decimal degrees.
fields.prompt: Find the latitude (decimal degrees) for '{{name}}' at '{{address}}'. Output number only or 'null'.

fields.name: longtitude
fields.description: Longitude of the entrance in decimal degrees (field name kept as provided).
fields.prompt: Find the longitude (decimal degrees) for '{{name}}' at '{{address}}'. Output number only or 'null'.

fields.name: city
fields.prompt: From '{{address}}', extract the city/locality for '{{name}}'. Output Title Case or 'null'.

fields.name: region
fields.prompt: From '{{address}}', extract the state/province/region for '{{name}}'. Output Title Case or 'null'.

fields.name: country
fields.prompt: From '{{address}}', return the ISO-2 country code for '{{name}}' (e.g., US, ID). If unknown, return 'null'.

fields.name: timezone
fields.prompt: Return the IANA timezone (Area/City) for '{{name}}' at '{{address}}'. If indeterminate, return 'null'.

fields.name: phone
fields.prompt: Find the public phone for '{{name}}' at '{{address}}'. Format in E.164. If not available, return 'null'.

fields.name: website
fields.prompt: Find the official HTTPS website for '{{name}}' at '{{address}}'. Return main homepage URL or 'null'.

fields.name: location_link
fields.prompt: Return the Google Maps place URL for '{{name}}' at '{{address}}'. If not found, return 'null'.

fields.name: street_view
fields.description: Google Street View URL focused on entrance.
fields.prompt: Return the Google Street View URL for '{{name}}' at '{{address}}' if available, else 'null'.

fields.name: photo
fields.prompt: Find the best primary photo URL (≥1600px) for '{{name}}'. Return direct HTTPS image URL or 'null'.

fields.name: logo
fields.prompt: Find the official logo (SVG/PNG) for '{{name}}'. Return direct HTTPS image URL or 'null'.

fields.name: amenities
fields.prompt: List confirmed amenities for '{{name}}' using allowed values: showers|lockers|cafe|wifi|parking|sauna|kids_zone|pro_shop. Output pipe-delimited or 'null'.

fields.name: working_hour
fields.prompt: Extract weekly opening hours for '{{name}}'. Format as mon:07:00-22:00|tue:07:00-22:00|... using 24h local time. If unknown, return 'null'.

fields.name: rating
fields.prompt: Return the average Google rating (0–5, 1 decimal) for '{{name}}' at '{{address}}', or 'null' if not listed.

fields.name: description_short
fields.prompt: Write ≤140-char one-line summary for '{{name}}' describing type and key amenities. No emojis/hashtags. If insufficient info, return 'null'.

fields.name: description_long
fields.description: 2–4 sentence overview of vibe, facilities, audience.
fields.prompt: Write a 2–4 sentence (240–480 chars) overview of '{{name}}' covering vibe, facilities, and audience. Avoid hype/unverified prices. If none, return 'null'.

fields.name: climbing_types
fields.prompt: Identify available disciplines for '{{name}}'. Allowed: bouldering|top_rope|lead|speed. Output pipe-delimited or 'null'.

fields.name: grade_system
fields.prompt: Identify grading systems used at '{{name}}'. Allowed: V|Font|YDS. Output pipe-delimited or 'null'.

fields.name: route_style
fields.prompt: Identify dominant setting style at '{{name}}'. Allowed: coordination|comp|traditional. Output pipe-delimited or 'null'.

fields.name: route_reset_frequency
fields.prompt: Determine reset cadence for '{{name}}'. Allowed: weekly|biweekly|monthly|quarterly|varies. If unknown, 'null'.

fields.name: total_problems
fields.description: Approximate count of active boulder problems.
fields.prompt: Return approximate number of boulder problems at '{{name}}'. Output integer or 'null'.

fields.name: wall_height_meters
fields.prompt: Return max wall height for '{{name}}' in meters (convert feet×0.3048). Output decimal or 'null'.

fields.name: crowd_peak_notes
fields.prompt: Summarize busy/quiet hours for '{{name}}' using Popular Times/reviews. ≤120 chars, or 'null'.

fields.name: training_facilities
fields.prompt: List training tools at '{{name}}'. Allowed: hangboard|campus_board|treadwall|weights|spray_wall. Pipe-delimited or 'null'.

fields.name: gear_rental
fields.prompt: List rental gear at '{{name}}'. Allowed: shoes|harness|belay_device|chalk_bag. Pipe-delimited or 'null'.

fields.name: beginner_friendly
fields.prompt: Return TRUE if '{{name}}' offers intro classes or rentals; FALSE if not; 'null' if unclear.

fields.name: access_notes
fields.prompt: Write ≤180-char transport/parking note for '{{name}}' at '{{address}}'. If unknown, 'null'.

fields.name: day_pass_price_local
fields.description: Adult day-pass price in local currency.
fields.prompt: Find adult day-pass price for '{{name}}'. Output numeric only (no symbol) or 'null'.

fields.name: student_discount
fields.prompt: Return TRUE if standing student discount exists at '{{name}}'; FALSE if not; 'null' if unclear.

fields.name: membership_from_local
fields.prompt: Return lowest standard adult monthly price for '{{name}}'. Numeric only or 'null'.

fields.name: price_type
fields.description: Type for the pricing record (if applicable).
fields.prompt: Classify pricing record type for '{{name}}'. Allowed: day_pass|ten_pass|membership|student|family|child. Output enum or 'null'.

fields.name: label
fields.prompt: Return customer-facing price label for '{{name}}' (e.g., 'Monthly Membership'). Output short phrase or 'null'.

fields.name: amount_local
fields.prompt: Return numeric price amount (no symbol) for the offer at '{{name}}', or 'null'.

fields.name: conditions
fields.prompt: Summarize eligibility/notes for the offer at '{{name}}' (e.g., 'Student ID required'). Short phrase or 'null'.

fields.name: section
fields.prompt: Return a section/area name for '{{name}}' (e.g., 'Main Comp Wall'). Short label or 'null'.

fields.name: discipline
fields.prompt: Return discipline for section at '{{name}}'. Allowed: bouldering|top_rope|lead|speed. Enum or 'null'.

fields.name: grade_range
fields.description: Displayed grade span for the section.
fields.prompt: Return displayed grade range at '{{name}}' (e.g., 'V0–V9'). Text or 'null'.

fields.name: problems_or_routes
fields.description: Count of problems or rope routes in section.
fields.prompt: Return count of problems/routes in section at '{{name}}'. Integer or 'null'.

fields.name: last_reset_date
fields.description: Most recent reset date for the section.
fields.prompt: Return most recent reset date for '{{name}}' as YYYY-MM-DD, or 'null'.

fields.name: next_reset_expectation
fields.prompt: Return expected reset cadence for '{{name}}': weekly|biweekly|monthly|quarterly|varies, or 'null'.
